comment:
“Anything you can tell me about the meeting?” You ask. “And what was up with Liza?”

“We've agreed not to disclose most of the major goings-on. Some false allegations were made by a few members of Disposable Heroes, suggesting she was acting to exacerbate the rioting in Averron.” Ayla responds. “It sounds ridiculous, really, given all of us—Liza included—were doing the best we could given incomplete information. Until she gave her verdict, I wasn't even aware that the leader of Freakshow was involved.”

“Right. So, what did you think I wanted to talk about?”

“I don't know.” She pouts. “I thought you knew something that you couldn't say in public, the way you were acting earlier.”

“Nope.” You shake your head. “Just the expedition and current events. Ah, were you still interested in having me join the Writ Keepers?”

“Mm,” She grits her teeth, turning away from you. “Don't tell anyone about this, okay?”

“Alright.”

> [[ Continued ]]
name: Sylvetica
